## Weekly Assignment 2

#### Question 1

``` {r}
myData <- function (p=NULL) {
  if(is.null(p)) {
    Type <- rep(c("Control", "Treatment"), each=25)
    Value <- c(rnorm(25, mean=10, sd=1.5), rnorm(25, mean=45, sd=2))
    p <- data.frame(Type, Value)
  
  }
  return (p)
}
  
```

#### Question 2
``` {r}
dataOutput <- myData ()
head (dataOutput)

```

#### Question 3: Generating ANOVA
``` {r}
# the first variable on the left side of the tilda denotes the dependent variable, the right-hand variable denotes the indepdent variable 

myDataAov <- aov(Value ~ Type, data=dataOutput)
summary(myDataAov)

```
